title: The Villainess Captured The Grand Duke - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Carefree Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Comedic Undertone   Confident Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   European Ambience   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Healers   Honest Protagonist   Marriage   Nobles   Obsessive Love   Power Struggle   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Quirky Characters   Reincarnated in Another World   Shameless Protagonist   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 뺩
description:
My favorite character in the novel died. 

Abandoned by the Heroine and lost his emotions, he could no longer use his abilities, and when he weakened, the North collapsed. 

Without even finding his body, the novel depicts only the happy ending of the main characters. And I possessed the evil girl in the novel,Shuire . ‘I’d rather get his emotions back before he meets the heroine.’ So I headed to the North.

“Duke, could you hold my hand? Or maybe an autograph. I’ll keep it as an heirloom.”

 “If you want to get my autograph, the Lady should also sign here ” 

“What’s this?”

“Marriage registration form.”

Pardon?

“Just like now. It seems that the Lady’s behavior makes me feel nervous.” 

…Do I have a chance now?>
